summary: AN ORDINANCE of the City of Seattle, Washington, providing for the submission to the qualified electors of the City at a special election to be held therein on February 13, 1968, of a proposition authorizing the City to issue its general obligation bonds out of its special utility purpose borrowing capacity, in the principal amount of not to exceed $70,000,000 for the purpose of construction of sanitary sewers and for the separation of sanitary and storm sewers within the City.
